properties.displayName: Configure code signing for training code for specified Azure Machine Learning computes
properties.description: This policy helps provide code signing for training code in specified Azure Machine Learning computes and can be assigned at the workspace. For more information, visit https://aka.ms/amlpolicydoc.

metadata.displayName: Compute names where Azure Machine Learning jobs run
metadata.description: List of compute names where this policy should be applied. Example: 'cpu-cluster;gpu-cluster'. If no value is provided to this parameter, policy is applicable to all computes.
Public key text in PGP public key format, with newline characters encoded as string literals "\r" and "\n".
Enable or disable the execution of the policy.
